title: Synthesis, mixed-spin-state structure and Langmuir–Blodgett deposition of amphiphilic Fe(III) quinolylsalicylaldiminate complexes
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28716-28723
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06111J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Peeranuch Poungsripong, Theerapoom Boonprab, Phimphaka Harding, Keith S. Murray, Wasinee Phonsri, Ningjin Zhang, Jonathan A. Kitchen, David J. Harding
Three amphiphilic iron(III) spin crossover complexes are reported which form stable Langmuir–Blodgett films. The alkyl chains also modulate spin crossover behaviour.
